channel.title: Home Page News Feed
channel.description: Explore the Elastos Official Blog for the latest updates on the World Computer, BeL2, and the evolving Elastos ecosystem.

item.title: Elastos Insights | Behind the Code: Weekly Elastos Technical Update
item.description: Weekly technical updates on Elastos ecosystem development: BeL2, Elacity v3 launch, and ElastOS progress, and more!
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | Real Web3 Utility with Elastos and Elacity
item.description: Elacity and Elastos are transforming Web3 by enabling real utility through digital ownership, monetization, and AI-driven markets.
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elacity is Live! Web3's Missing Monetization Layer Has Arrived
item.description: Elacity is building the missing monetization layer on Web3—tokenize digital content, devices, and intelligence with resale, royalties, and more on Elastos.
item.dc:creator: 4hm3d

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos (ELA ) Tokens on Different Networks and How to Bridge
item.description: A comprehensive guide explaining the different versions of ELA across the Elastos ecosystem networks and how to bridge tokens between them.
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | Behind the Code: Weekly Elastos Technical Update
item.description: Stay ahead with Behind the Code series. Discover the latest Elastos technical updates, blockchain improvements, and innovations for a decentralized internet.
item.dc:creator: 4hm3d

item.title: Elastos Insights | Steak Dinner or Stake ELA? Spoiler: One Tastes Sweeter Over Time
item.description: Earn passive income of up to 5% APR staking ELA while helping secure Elastos' blockchain and decentralized internet ecosystem
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos: Decentralized Internet Secured by Bitcoin
item.description: Elastos Smartweb redefines the internet with blockchain, enabling data ownership and decentralization—secured by Bitcoin.
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | A New Look for Elastos
item.description: Elastos unveils a Bitcoin-inspired look and updates its website, advancing its vision for a user-centric Decentralized Internet.
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Gordon

item.title: Elastos Insights | World Computer Initiative (WCI) – March 2025 Community Update!
item.description: World Computer Community Update: Discover how we are enabling personal virtual computers and private NAS for a user-owned internet!
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | The World Computer Initiative: Building Digital Freedom
item.description: Discover Elastos' World Computer Initiative and learn how ElastOS will empower true data ownership and a consumer-friendly Web3 future.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos 0.9.9 BPoS Upgrade: Everything You Need to Know
item.description: Upgrade to Elastos 0.9.9 BPoS for enhanced network security, new slashing penalties, and improved DPoS node rules. Learn how it impacts you!
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | BeL2 Update: Unified BTC Experience & Arbiter Incentives
item.description: Discover the latest BeL2 update featuring streamlined BTC integration, ELA faucet deployment, and enhanced arbiter rewards.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos Secures $20M Investment from Rollman Management to Unlock Trillions in Bitcoin Finance
item.description: Elastos Secures $20M from Rollman Management to Expand Bitcoin-Native DeFi, Merge-Mined ELA, and Web3 Creator Economy
item.dc:creator: 4hm3d

item.title: Elastos Insights | BeL2 Lending Demo: Arbiter Integration and One-Click Deployment
item.description: Learn about how BeL2’s Lending Demo DApp is now connected to BeL2 Arbiters! Become Arbiters now with one-click node deployment!
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | BeL2 Arbiter Network: Your Setup Guide to Bitcoin DeFi and Incentive Rewards
item.description: Set up your BeL2 Arbiter Node and join the decentralized Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem with our guide, including a PDF, AI chat and video tutorials.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos Announces Arbiter Network for BeL2 Protocol, Opening a New Era of Non-Custodial BTC Finance
item.description: Discover how Elastos' BeL2 Arbiter Network enhances Bitcoin DeFi with EVM integration, all whilst keeping BTC on the mainnet.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | TeamELA.org: A Bitcoin-Secured Digital Reserve Asset Portal
item.description: Discover the all-in-one portal TeamELA.org for how ELA merges with Bitcoin’s hashrate as the BTC-secured Reserve Asset.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | ELA Arbiters: The Final Piece in BeL2’s Vision for Bitcoin DeFi
item.description: Discover how BeL2 enhances Bitcoin’s DeFi capabilities with secure cross-chain contracts, Arbiters, and a new era of Bitcoin-backed lending.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | Elastos Launches Fiat On/Off Ramp, Adds Liquidity and Gets Solana Support Through Chainge Finance
item.description: Elastos, in partnership with Chainge Finance, introduces a fiat on/off ramp, adds liquidity, and Solana support for cross-chain DEX swaps
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | AI Kallipolis: Building the New Bretton Woods in the Age of Bitcoin and Artificial Intelligence
item.description: In 2024, AI Kallipolis and the New Bretton Woods initiative combine Bitcoin and artificial intelligence to redefine global finance.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Insights | Victus Capital Partners with Cyber Republic DAO to Propel Elastos Ecosystem
item.description: Discover how Victus Capital's partnership with Cyber Republic DAO advances the decentralized internet and strengthens the Elastos ecosystem.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Blog & News | Ivy League Student-Led Project Publishes Whitepaper on Bitcoin-Backed Stablecoin Built with Elastos Tech
item.description: Learn how Harvard student-led NBW Labs is transforming decentralized finance with a Bitcoin-backed stablecoin powered by the BeL2 protocol.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Blog & News | BeL2 Arbiter Protocol Development Update and the Future of Bitcoin DeFi Infrastructure
item.description: Learn more about Elastos' BeL2 Arbiter Protocol where ELA-backed nodes enable trustless financial infrastructure for Native Bitcoin DeFi.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Blog & News | Particle Network's "BTC Connect" Now Integrated into Elastos!
item.description: Particle Network's BTC Connect integration with Elastos enhances Bitcoin interactions, offering users a seamless blockchain experience.
item.dc:creator: Sash

item.title: Elastos Blog & News | Elastos BPoS NFTs: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
item.description: Learn all about Elastos BPoS NFTs—how they work, stay secure, and are managed via the Essentials Wallet—in our detailed FAQ.
item.dc:creator: Sash
